# update(_:)

**Instance Method**

Registers the current user activity with the system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func update(_ userActivity: NSUserActivity)
```

## Coordinating Handoff activity

- **invalidateUserActivity()**: Invalidates the most recent user activity.
